name: Women's Clothing
description: This category features a wide range of clothing items designed specifically for women. It includes dresses, tops, bottoms, outerwear, and accessories tailored to women's styles and preferences.

name: Men's Clothing
description: This category offers an assortment of clothing options for men. It includes shirts, pants, jeans, suits, jackets, and accessories designed to cater to men's fashion trends and needs.

name: Accessories
description: This category focuses on various fashion accessories that complement outfits. It includes items such as handbags, wallets, belts, scarves, hats, sunglasses, and jewelry, providing customers with the finishing touches to complete their looks.
